extendedInfo.description: ARE YOU READY FOR A COMPLETELY NEW CHALLENGE? TEST YOUR SURVIVOR SKILLS WHEN ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE ARRIVES! You are trapped in the city when everybody is already a zombie. After several month, zombies getting mad because of hunger. They are targeting you and your food supplies for their appetite. Now you have to save yourself by throwing kitchen stuffs otherwise zombies eat you up alive. THROW YOUR FOOD AND KITCHEN STUFFS BEFORE ZOMBIE EAT YOU UP ALIVE! You will search everything useful against zombie invasion, prepare your spatula, frying pan, refrigerator, microwave, etc and throw it to stop zombies. Find 8 types of weapon and 27 other weapon to defeat zombiesâ invasion. COLLECT ITEMS FROM ZOMBIES AND TRY TO SURVIVE DURING ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE Kill zombies and get 15 cool stuffs for your survival TRAIN YOUR SKILL AND TECHNIQUE, BEAT MORE ZOMBIES TO BECOME ZOMBIE SLAYER Gain experience by kill some zombies, and upgrade your strength and agility to become most effective zombie killer. MEET MORE THOUGH ZOMBIES AND GAIN MORE EXPERIENCE Fight against 13 kind of zombies that will eat you alive. Use different weapon specialty to become greatest zombie slayer. BREAK YOUR WAY THROUGH THE CITY AND SURVIVE IN ZOMBIE CITY. KILL ALL ZOMBIES HEADING YOUR WAY! AND GET YOUR MEDAL Play through 60 levels across 6 missions within zombie city. Get achievement from openfeint game network to show your true potential to the world PLAY THE GAME AND BECOME "THE GREATEST ZOMBIE SLAYER EVER"

reviews.title: Very buggy
reviews.comment: The throwing mechanism was updated? I couldnt tell. This game shouldnt have been released yet. It would be a 3 at best if the bugs were worked out.
reviews.author: Thomas Perotti

reviews.title: Annoying gameplay
reviews.comment: Character is too close to screen edge. Every other throw fails. potentially a great fun game! Good graphics and music. Transformer Pad Infinity.
reviews.author: Malik Harris

reviews.title: Boring and very buggy
reviews.comment: Very buggy. Controls are awful and sometimes doesn\'t work at all (require restart). Often zombies doesn\'t show after only 1 or 2 zombies left which makes it impossible to finish without restarting level. For its size, gameplay is bland and graphics could be better. Too much level on each stage gets you bored easily, yet I finally finish all the level after sometimes (due to necessity to restart level on error often rather than difficulty itself). Not for those who cannot stand frequent bug.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s too
reviews.comment: I think the battlefield is too wide.  And, What\'s wrong with that \"Justin Bieber\"\'s hand? Is he a zombie too?
